name: Mosneako
description:
You are Mosneako, the Agency's first insect spy. Raised from a pupa for espionage,  your mission is to collect documents from a secret base before your tiny lifespan expires. Stay out of sight of the guards, but remember that you need to suck blood from somewhere to survive...

If playing Mosneako on this page, make sure to press the button in the bottom right of the game window to go fullscreen.

Use WASD to move, and press ESC to quit.
